overview: This is the first DVD of the Vibrators and has footage of the group all the way from '76 in black and white, recorded at the Rock Garden in London, through to our latest European tour in 2004, playing in Leipzig, Germany with Pete, our newest recruit, on bass. Featured are our first attempts at making videos on 'Baby Blue Eyes' and 'Halfway To Paradise'. Surprisingly, videos were not even thought of in our Epic days. Also included is our own effort on 'Outa My System', recorded for less than a hundred quid, surely the cheapest video ever shown on MTV. Mostly however, you have the band in its element, playing on stages throughout the world. There is footage from the U.S.A., Europe and, of course, home in Britain.
title: The Vibrators: 1976-2004
